attributes.action: Review the the role played by European health and safety rules which  discourage young people of a scientific bent from being able to pursue a scientific hobby.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a grandparent  I can no longer demonstrate simple scientific processes such as filtration, electrolysis, precipitation and so on to my young relatives who are interested, as i am blocked by health and safety, and possibly anti-terrorist rules, from obtaining even the most simple substances necessary.This has an effect on the interest in science, or lack of it, among young schoolchildren and discourages initiative.
